structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Duties of commission -- Authority for administrative regulations.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 40, effective June 20, 2005. -- Repealed and reenacted 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 203, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996.
